name: Abomination Restoration
description:
Oh no! all your pets exploded from a huge nuclear explosion because of one of your MAD experiments! Take pieces of your pet's animal parts and bring them back to life with the power of MAAAAAD SCIENCE!!!! a fun 2-4 player party game that allows for creativity, stealing, and lots of funny creatures! 

Important Note - If you plan to use controllers, connect them before opening the game.
